name: 冀水尘
bio_zh:
我目前就读于西北工业大学自动化学院，攻读人工智能硕士学位，师从张鼎文教授。
目前的研究兴趣主要包括多模态大模型、显著性检测以及diffusion model。
bio_en:
I am currently studying at the Automation College of Northwestern Polytechnical University, pursuing a master's degree in artificial intelligence under the guidance of Professor Zhang Dingwen.
My current research interests mainly include multimodal large models, saliency detection, and diffusion models.
research_interests: 多模态大模型、显著性检测
